brief_title: A Study With Gemcitabine, Cisplatin, and LY293111 in Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness and side effects of LY293111 given in combination with gemcitabine and cisplatin in patients with non-small cell lung cancer.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer, Stage IIIB or IV that is not amenable to either surgery of curative intent or radiation therapy - Tumor that can be measured by x-ray or scan - Adequate organ function Exclusion Criteria: - Inability to swallow capsules - Documented brain metastases - Prior chemotherapy or biological therapy for this disease
